targets.expr: (sum(increase(traces_service_graph_request_total{failed="true", server=~"$service"}[$__range])) by (server_http_method, server_http_target) + sum(increase(traces_service_graph_request_failed_total{server=~"$service"}[$__range])) by (server_http_method, server_http_target)) / sum(increase(traces_service_graph_request_total{server=~"$service"}[$__range])) by (server_http_method, server_http_target) * 100
